info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 07 at 4:10AM MST until January 08 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Walsenburg Vicinity/Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Feet. * WHEN...From late tonight through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
